name: Decon Co. (PenguinEmporium)
description:
They've got materials, we've got explosives!

Old construction materials need to go somewhere. The Deconstruction Company is here for all your esoteric deconstruction needs. Be the little blue lizard Charks as he attempts to destroy as many materials as he can while avoiding being crushed. What highscore can you reach? Post your scores below!

Controls:

Pull out/Throw bomb - Left mouse

Explode all bombs - Right mouse

Movement - WASD

Jump - Spacebar

Aim - WASD or mouse aim

Bomb jump - Aim down or hold S when throwing a bomb. Bomb jumping immediately after jumping provides best height.

Esc - Pause/resume
